title: (x) Bjork cover font - custom by M/M Paris {Dav}
content:
Can you please ID this font? The artwork is by M/M(Paris).

[http://unit.bjork.com/77island/77island/images/volumenplus1big.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114112004/http:/unit.bjork.com/77island/77island/images/volumenplus1big.jpg)
author: gtrianta

comments.content:
And, Guess what? The typeface has been designed exclusively by M/M Paris for Björk. :)

Dav

I thought so ... I certainly didn't hoped so ...

George Triantafyllakos - backpacker.gr

A similar typeface. Hope you can make use of that!?

[http://fontfarm.de/themes/fonts/nafi/01\_01\_00.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114112004/http:/fontfarm.de/themes/fonts/nafi/01_01_00.php "http://fontfarm.de/themes/fonts/nafi/01\_01\_00.php")

Greetings: Steven

You also might like Eric Olson's [FIG Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114112004/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=PRC.123372.0.2&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Bj%C3%B6rk+Lover&sampleSize=48).

and then there's always ito by [kinema moon](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114112004/http:/www.kinemamoon.com/)... in fact, there's some link between kinema moon and M/M paris that I want to get to the bottom of someday when i have more time. this is not the only bjork typeface that MM Paris and KM have that parallel each other. I mean, check the typeface on her [Greatest Hits](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114112004/http:/www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00006F852/ref=ase_mmparis/002-3726800-5910427?s=music&v=glance&n=5174&tagActionCode=mmparis) and then check out Sakura by KM... hmmm... something fishy's goin on here...
